name: Retro infiity
description:
Simple 8 bit style infinity scroller.

I made this over the span of a week or two while my classes were out for uni, and I find it rather relaxing :)

It doesn't need good requirements but if there is a bug for you just wait for updates to here as i'll be ironing things out later on.

Some images were used from a content pack so full credit to him, his art is awesome

https://ansimuz.itch.io/
